title: GD, Do You Know Calculus is Pretty Straight Forward?
body:
http://www.wolframalpha.com/

Not really needed for Calc 1-3, but when you take more advanced math courses for engineering, physics, or pure mathematics for finance/economics this baby helped a lot. Don't say its cheating because we all know how "learning" works and that it involves reverse engineering our approach on tackling problems by breaking it down into something we can manage... Like Master Yi's **10 SECOND** Highlander Ulti.
